subject: Football (College)
Television
Sugar Bowl
Bowl Games
lead_paragraph: Ohio State’s 42-35 upset of Alabama in the Sugar Bowl attracted 28.27 million viewers, making it the most-watched event in cable TV history, but now comes Part B for ESPN: Ohio State versus Oregon.
snippet: Ohio State’s 42-35 upset of Alabama in the Sugar Bowl attracted 28.27 million viewers, making it the most-watched event in cable TV history, but now comes Part B for ESPN: Ohio State versus Oregon.
